content: garter stitch is very popular at the moment so i thought an quick and easy pattern in a few sizes would good a lovely little gift for a new baby sizes preemie 0 - 3 months 3 - 6 months 6 - 12 months requirements dk yarn 4mm needles gauge 22sts = 4 10cm so cute **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
